name: CIFilterShape
desc: A description of the bounding shape of a filter and the domain of definition for a filter operation.

items.name: init(rect: CGRect)
items.desc: Initializes a filter shape object with a rectangle.

items.name: var extent: CGRect
items.desc: The extent of the filter shape.

items.name: func insetBy(x: Int32, y: Int32) -> CIFilterShape
items.desc: Modifies a filter shape object so that it is inset by the specified x and y values.

items.name: func intersect(with: CIFilterShape) -> CIFilterShape
items.desc: Creates a filter shape object that represents the intersection of the current filter shape and the specified filter shape object.

items.name: func intersect(with: CGRect) -> CIFilterShape
items.desc: Creates a filter shape that represents the intersection of the current filter shape and a rectangle.

items.name: func transform(by: CGAffineTransform, interior: Bool) -> CIFilterShape
items.desc: Creates a filter shape that results from applying a transform to the current filter shape.

items.name: func union(with: CIFilterShape) -> CIFilterShape
items.desc: Creates a filter shape that results from the union of the current filter shape and another filter shape object.

items.name: func union(with: CGRect) -> CIFilterShape
items.desc: Creates a filter shape that results from the union of the current filter shape and a rectangle.
